author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the OnePieceFun cog! Get ready for some pirate shenanigans!
name: OnePieceFun
short: Fun One Piece-themed commands for entertainment!
description: This cog provides a variety of fun, One Piece-themed commands to entertain and engage your server's One Piece fans. From generating bounties to creating pirate names, this cog brings the world of One Piece to your Discord server!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
